Package controller

Class KeyboardListener

java.lang.Object
controller.KeyboardListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>
public class KeyboardListener extends Object implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>
Handles keyboard input for controlling paddle movement, pausing, and restarting the game. Binds specific keys to actions within the game, allowing for real-time interaction.

  • Constructor Details

    • KeyboardListener

      public KeyboardListener(GameState game)
      Constructs a KeyboardListener with a reference to the game state.
      Parameters:
      game - The current game state, used for accessing paddle objects and game dimensions.

  • Method Details

    • handle

      public void handle(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
      Processes key press and release events to update control flags and manage game states. Supports controlling two paddles with 'W', 'S', and 'UP', 'DOWN' keys, respectively. Also manages game pause and restart actions with 'SPACE' and 'ENTER'.
      Specified by:
      handle in interface javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - The event triggered by key actions.

    • isGamePaused

      public boolean isGamePaused()
      Checks if the game is currently paused.
      Returns:
      True if the game is paused, false otherwise.

    • isGameRestart

      public boolean isGameRestart()
      Checks if there's a request to restart the game.
      Returns:
      True if a restart request was made, false otherwise.

    • isWasPaused

      public boolean isWasPaused()
      Checks if the game was paused before the current state.
      Returns:
      True if the game was previously paused, false otherwise.

    • setGameRestart

      public void setGameRestart(boolean gameRestart)
      Sets the game restart flag, used to indicate a request to restart the game.
      Parameters:
      gameRestart - True to request a restart, false otherwise.

    • setWasPaused

      public void setWasPaused(boolean paused)
      Sets the flag indicating whether the game was paused before the current state.
      Parameters:
      paused - True if the game was paused, false otherwise.

    • paddleMovement

      public void paddleMovement()
      Initiates paddle movement based on the current key press states. Moves the paddles up or down within the game boundaries.

    • movePaddleUp

      public void movePaddleUp(Paddle paddle)
      Moves the specified paddle up if it is not at the top boundary.
      Parameters:
      paddle - The paddle to move up.

    • movePaddleDown

      public void movePaddleDown(Paddle paddle)
      Moves the specified paddle down if it is not at the bottom boundary.
      Parameters:
      paddle - The paddle to move down.
